ygData.subject: Re: WOOHOO!
ygData.msgSnippet: Congrats Slyde!  No worries on the Lute, It would have been a stretch to get there.  Although, with the 30 minute timer, I may have had time to log in a twink,
ygData.messageBody:
Congrats Slyde! No worries on the Lute, It would have been a stretch
to get there. Although, with the 30 minute timer, I may have had
time to log in a twink, buy a stone, log in my friends wizard, pick
up the stone and then TP myself up to Hate in time... let me stress
MAY have had time, hehe... My other 2 Wizzie friends apologized
profusely but were either killing Goranaire or raiding Skyshrine.
Like that's more important?? LOL

I still wish a BP dropped for me... er, I mean 2 BP's, one for you
and one for me. :) (inside joke)

Darkfox

p.s. remind me to park a few Hate stones on my friend's wizzie. :)



Slyde wrote:

They go to loot him ┬û sadly for the Warrior ┬û no Hand; but he had 2
count em 2 Seven String Lutes! I was the only bard on the Raid. I
gave Darkfox a tell ┬û and there was some talk between us of trying to
get him before it rotted but stupid me ┬û in all the zone spam I
missed some Mage asking if she could loot the lute for
her "collection". Not clear whether Darkfox could have gotten up in
time though.
